billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Creates the cell phone users' bill of rights
summary: Creates the cell phone users' bill of rights; provides that customers be given a thirty-day trial period; provides that a customer shall not be liable for calls or messages that were not made from the customer's phone; provides that a company shall be liable to the customer for violating these provisions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to creating the cell phone users' bill of rights
